thread.title: Cubs outslug Cardinals, 8-6 - Channel3000
thread.title_full: Cubs outslug Cardinals, 8-6 - Channel3000 - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Channel3000
title: Cubs outslug Cardinals, 8-6 - Channel3000
text:
Kris Bryant and Jorge Soler each hit two-run drives and the Chicago Cubs connected for a postseason franchise-record six homers in an 8-6 victory over the St. Louis Cardinals in Game 3 of the NL Division Series on Monday. Kyle Schwarber, Anthony Rizzo, Starlin Castro and Dexter Fowler also homered, powering Jake Arrieta to another win despite a rare off night for the bearded ace.
 Channel3000.
